function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The text contains multiple references to disruption, non-operability, and recovery, indicating a focus on the impact of contagious diseases on system resilience.","Impact":"Failure to address the impact of contagious diseases on system resilience may result in widespread disruptions and non-operability of critical infrastructure.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to enhance system resilience, such as increasing redundancy, diversifying supply chains, and developing contingency plans for workforce disruptions.","Technologies":"Technologies for enhancing system resilience, such as advanced analytics for risk assessment, real-time monitoring systems, and adaptive infrastructure design.","People":"Infrastructure operators, system planners, public health officials, and policymakers.","Owner":"Infrastructure operators, system planners, public health agencies, and government organizations."}]}
